subject: Baseball
News and News Media
Indecency, Obscenity and Profanity
lead_paragraph: A question from Paul Olden, now the Yankees’ public-address announcer, ignited a profane tirade by the Dodgers’ manager in 1978.
snippet: A question from Paul Olden, now the Yankees’ public-address announcer, ignited a profane tirade by the Dodgers’ manager in 1978.
